com.epam.training.servlet

Class ControllerServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.epam.training.servlet.ControllerServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class ControllerServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet ControllerServlet is a Servlet implementation class that controls communication between Command interface and JSPs. It calls the proper Command class and then redirects the request to the proper JSP.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev
    See Also:
    HttpServlet, Serialized Form
